name.ja_JP: ファクションルーキーカップ<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

info.en_US: Refight several early battles found during your quests for the factions!
info.de_DE: Bekämpfe nochmals die frühen Bosse aus den Quests der Fraktionen!
info.zh_CN: 再次对抗几个早期派系任务！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ja_JP: ゲーム序盤のファクションクエストで出会った敵ともう一度戦おう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
info.ko_KR: 초기 세력 퀘스트 진행 중 싸웠던 몬스터들과 다시 싸우세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

core.condition: quest.fd-2-meerkat-cave.solved && quest.rhg-2-crate_smuggle.solved && quest.miners-1-dirtbunnies.solved && quest.bg-2-goat_cave_1.solved && quest.nomadAdv-1-turtle_bombing_1.solved && quest.bakiGuard-1-basar_thief_1.solved

objective.en_US: Refight the \c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0] and his gang of \c[3]Hillkats\c[0] in their cave in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]!
objective.de_DE: Bekämpfe nochmals den \c[3]Hillkat-Anführer\c[0] und seine Bande von \c[3]Hillkats\c[0] in ihrer Höhle in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN: 在\c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]的洞穴中再次与\c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0]和他的\c[3]地鼠\c[0]走狗们对战!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP: \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0]の洞窟で出会った\c[3]\v[combat.name.meerkat-special-command-1]\c[0]と子分の\c[3]ヒルキャット\c[0]たちともう一度戦え！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US: Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.turret-rhg-1]\c[0] that got you in a crossfire in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]!
objective.de_DE: Besiege das \c[3]Illegale Rhombus-Geschütz\c[0], das dich in \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] unter Kreuzfeuer genommen hat!
objective.ja_JP: \c[3]\v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0]で集中砲火を浴びせられた\c[3]\v[combat.name.turret-rhg-1]\c[0]を倒せ！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Defeat the \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]s\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Remember to \c[3]give them a bath\c[0] first!
objective.de_DE:
Besiege die \c[3]Dreckigen Pogonickel\c[0] auf dem \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Vergiss nicht, sie vorher \c[3]zu baden\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
击败\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]的\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]\c[0]!
记得\c[3]先给它们洗个澡\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]の\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]\c[0]を倒せ！
\c[3]水に落としてから\c[0]倒すことを忘れずに！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]에 있는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/frobbit-quest-dirty]\c[0]을 처치하세요!
먼저 \c[3]목욕을 시키는\c[0] 것을 잊지 마세요!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

name.ja_JP: ゴートファーザー PART I<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Meet the \c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0] again and \c[3]defeat his subordinates\c[0] in \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]!
Be careful of \c[3]bombs\c[0]!
objective.de_DE: Begegne nochmals dem \c[3]Geißpaten\c[0] und \c[3]besiege seine Untergebenen\c[0] auf dem \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]! Vorsicht vor den \c[3]Bomben\c[0]!
objective.zh_CN:
在\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]再次击败\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0]和他的\c[3]手下们\c[0]!
小心\c[3]炸弹\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
\c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]で出会った\c[3]\v[combat.name.cold/goat-father]\c[0]と\c[3]その部下たち\c[0]をもう一度倒せ！
\c[3]爆弾\c[0]に気を付けよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Crack the shells of \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]s\c[0] with the help of your trusty \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]!
Hitting the \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0] with \c[3]charged projectiles\c[0] will make it dispense \c[3]bombs\c[0]!
objective.de_DE:
Knacke den Panzer der \c[3]Drillkröten\c[0] mit Hilfe deines treuen \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]!
Du kannst \c[3]Bomben\c[0] legen, indem du den \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0] mit \c[3]aufgeladenen Projektilen\c[0] triffst!
objective.zh_CN:
使用\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]打爆\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]s\c[0]的龟壳!
使用\c[3]蓄力飞弹\c[0]击中\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]会让其产出\c[3]炸弹\c[0]!

<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
頼れる\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]の助けを借りて、\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]\c[0]の甲羅を砕け！
\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]に\c[3]チャージ弾\c[0]を当てて、\c[3]爆弾\c[0]を放出させよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
믿음직한 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]의 도움을 받아 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/drillertoise]\c[0]의 껍질을 부수세요!
\c[3]충전된 발사체\c[0]로 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/kamikatze-helper]\c[0]을 타격하면 \c[3]폭탄\c[0]이 나옵니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]

objective.en_US:
Fight the favored machinery of treacherous Baki'Kum guards, \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]s\c[0] led by a \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]!
\c[3]Break the leader\c[0] to deactivate the \c[3]shields\c[0] of the turrets!
objective.de_DE:
Bekämpfe die Lieblingswaffe der heimtückischen Baki-Wachen, die \c[3]Legionsgeschütze v1\c[0], die vom \c[3]Legionsanführer v1\c[0] befehligt werden!
\c[3]Brich den Anführer\c[0], um die \c[3]Schilde\c[0] der Geschütze zu deaktivieren!
objective.zh_CN:
与巴基库姆险恶守卫的爱用机械\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]作战，它们的首领是一个\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]!
\c[3]破坏首领\c[0]来降下炮台的\c[3]护盾\c[0]!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ja_JP:
マルーン・バキ警備隊の裏切者が使用していた、\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]率いる\c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]の部隊を倒せ！ 
まずは\c[3]リーダーをブレイク\c[0]させて、タレットの\c[3]シールド\c[0]を無効化しよう！<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
objective.ko_KR:
불성실한 바키쿰 경비원 사이에서 인기 있는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-cmd_bot]\c[0]이 이끄는 \c[3]\v[combat.name.heat/special/baki-turret_1]\c[0]과 싸우세요!
포탑의 \c[3]방어막\c[0]을 비활성화하려면 \c[3]리더를 격파\c[0]해야 합니다!<<A<<[CHANGED 2019/07/31]
